name: zed-gt-extension
description: this is a zed editor extension to highlight syntax for custom text file: .gt

scripts.release: npx tree-sitter generate && git add -A && git commit -m 'regenerate grammar' && HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && sed -i '' "s/^commit = .*/commit = \"$HASH\"/" extension.toml && git add extension.toml && git commit -m 'hash bump' && git push
